IN RE the ESTATE OF Al KATZ, Deceased Lawrence T. Newman, Appellant,
v.
Robert W. York, as Personal Representative; Internal Revenue Service; and, State of Indiana, Appellees. Court of Appeals Case No. 18A-ES-1721 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED December 31, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

BROWN , J.

Affirmed and remanded.

RILEY, J., Concurs.

BRADFORD, J., Concurs.
